title: Stik in brnze 5 kant' get out help plez
body: hi i have over 800 wins but i find botr really hard. is there any tips you can gif me bec evrery time i play bots i keep feeding but lege is a wondafal gaam and i wan t to keep playing it bu t i find it hard plz thankx guys

replies.body: I see you took the bait guys. good job
Try learning to type. Can really improve your communication. Also be sure to prioritise the nexus over the enemy wolf camp.
